data.message: I need help getting back a blocked account, It won't let me sign in and all I get is a message telling me that Fb will contact me. Please help!

replies.message: Hi Jezel. We hear your frustration. If you think you may have been blocked by mistake, you can file an appeal here: http://bit.ly/2qsBxpV. -Brittany
Thank you so much. This has been frustrating indeed.
Facebook  it takes me to a page that I can't acces through the blocked account 😭😭
I have the screenshot but can't post it in the comments. I'm in tears literally
Hi Jezel. Click the "submit an appeal" link on this page: http://bit.ly/2rmPZPm. -Brittany
Facebook I did. And it says that the email I provided doesn't belong to a disabled account. It's been weeks going around in circles please help 🙏
We hear your frustration, Jezel. Use this link to report what you're experiencing to our team so we can assist you further: http://bit.ly/2rct3WT. -Brittany
The thing is that I can't log in into the account to do this. I need my pictures please!😢 Is there a way where I can  contact Facebook through the phone maybe?
